channel.title: Jcenter on Jeroen Mols
channel.description: Recent content in Jcenter on Jeroen Mols

item.title: Migrate existing library artifacts from JCenter to Maven Central
item.author: info@jeroenmols.com (Jeroen Mols)
item.description: With JCenter shutting down, many are migrating to Maven Central. And while there are many posts on how to publish new artifacts, also all existing artifacts should be migrated away from JCenter.

item.title: Migrating away from JCenter
item.author: info@jeroenmols.com (Jeroen Mols)
item.description: This week JFrog - out of nowhere - announced to completely remove their Maven repository. Since they’ll pull it offline already by May 2021 (!!!) it’s time to urgently migrate away.
